Name: Mohamad
description:
Mohamad is a 45-year-old Lebanese married man, living with his wife and four school-aged children. He has been working independently since 2013 in the agriculture field and his wife owns a clothes shop.

Due to a bad financial situation, Mohamad seeks a loan from Kiva partner, Vitas s.a.l., to pay his children's school fees, with the aim of ensuring them a good education.
